snippet.title: Best Langauge Learning Apps - Hidden Animals: English - Spanish TRAILER
snippet.description:
http://www.progorion.com/HiddenAnimals

Hidden Animals: English - Spanish is a relaxing hidden object game with the aim to teach you the Spanish names of animals featuring exclusive piano music. (You can use the program to study English names as well if you are from a Spanish speaking country).

In the game you have 3 worlds to play. In the first one you have to find animals by their English names, in the third one you have to find them by their Spanish names. In the second world you see both the English and Spanish name of the animals. You can freely choose levels from the 3 worlds.

The quicker you find objects the higher score and achievement you get. By getting 3 stars compliting a level you will get pieces from the puzzle of the Hidden Animals.

72 Challenging Hidden Object levels using 36 backgrounds
Language learning aspect 
3 language worlds to play (English, English - Spanish, Spanish)
112 items to discover
Built-in Owl Eye Hint
3 Hidden Animals Fresco
More than 3-8 hours of gameplay


Building your vocabulary is about repitition. The best way to repeat words is to use them somehow and in our opinion a game is a really good tool for that. Many of us learned English from video games. This small game is for those who likes the hidden object genre that offer a relaxing activity with a really useful feature: helping you to study Spanish.

The dedicated music of the game was made by András Illés who is a multi-instrumental musician and composer.
